text: Yehoiada babarima Benaia na na ɔdi Keretifoɔ8.18 Na Keretifoɔ ne Peletifoɔ yɛ ahɔhoɔ asraafoɔ a wɔbɔ wɔn paa ma wɔko. Keretifoɔ no ase firi Krete ɛnna Peletifoɔ no nso ase firi Filistia. Wɔtaa bɔ saa akuo mmienu yi din sɛ awɛmfoɔ a wɔwɛn adehyeɛ. ne Peletifoɔ so, ɛnna Dawid mmammarima tua asɔfodɔm ano.
